resources.string:
The Dept.of Education was established in the year 2004 and is situated in Dr.D.Y.Patil University Sector 7 NerulNaviMumbai.Department conducts Certificate Courses in Fine Art.
Vision of Department – Teacher educators who take on the scared role of initiating the young into the mysteries of knowledge, skill and value.It is they to whom society entrusts the young to mould into strong committed citizens who will cherish and nourish the ideals and ideas of their society into the next generation.
Mission of Department – The college aim to form secondary school teachers with a high degree of academic excellence knowledge of a subject matter experts in teaching methodology co-curricular activities and imbued with a high sense of moral values and commitment to both their students and the wider community in which they operate . It also aims at assisting better linkages between the teaching profession and the wider world of work.It aims to be the spearhead of educational research and reform,to contribute to the development of a fuller human formation for both teachers and students at all levels.
